name: Light at bay
description:
This game was made for a jam but was too late to submiss it. RIP. 

This game has a ENDLESS forest.  there is no end to the forest so watch the light of your fireplace to come back home and if you lose it well. RIP. collect leaves to  reignite the fire and your torch.

I may finish this with the vision I originally wanted but that depends if it gets traction.

The full version if i were to make it.

Crafting system

Story

Buildings

More monsters
